document_data.mainbody:
he Tailors Federation was the guildhall for tailors in the city of Daggerford in the Western Heartlands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The guildhall was located at the junction of the High Road and the Trade Way in central of Daggerford near the northeast corner of the drill field.
The three story building was in a general state of disrepair as the guild didnt have the funds to restore it. The interior of the first floor was decorated with fine art objects.
